title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repo: CLI and Go library for pulling, running, and managing quantized Llama-2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally with GPU/Metal acceleration.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama HTTP API—works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama; PyPI package provides chat, generate, pull, and embedding APIs.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat, and embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (renamed to ‘Open WebUI’) with multi-user, RAG, and plugin support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama; offers synchronous & reactive APIs and Kotlin extensions.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API with ActiveModel-style interfaces.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, conversation history, and model switching.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension turning Ollama models into inline coding copilots with autocomplete and explain features.

title: ollama-chem
summary: Python package that wraps Ollama for chemical-name-aware SMILES generation and property prediction.

title: ollama-benchmark
summary: Community benchmark suite measuring tokens/sec, latency, and memory across GPUs/CPUs for every Ollama model.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack 2.0 pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Curated recipes for deploying Ollama with Docker, Kubernetes, GPU stacks, and example apps in Go, Python, and Rust.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake providing reproducible builds of Ollama and 50+ model derivations for NixOS.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up ephemeral Ollama services in CI pipelines for integration testing.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 community SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Streamlit app showing RAG over PDFs using Ollama embeddings + Chroma, entirely offline.

title: ollama-node
summary: Zero-dependency Node.js client for Ollama published on npm; supports ESM/CJS and TypeScript.

title: ollama-powershell
summary: PowerShell module that wraps the Ollama API with cmdlets like Invoke-OllamaChat and Get-OllamaModel.
